amendment.description: Amendment requires an annual report on strikes undertaken by the United States against terrorist targets to be submitted by the Director of National Intelligence instead of the Secretary of Defense.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 1 printed in Part B of House Report 116-143 to require an annual report on strikes undertaken by the United States against terrorist targets to be submitted by the Director of National Intelligence instead of the Secretary of Defense.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Smith (WA) amendment (A001) Agreed to by recorded vote: 236 - 193 (Roll no. 438).

action.text: Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
Roll call votes on amendments in House
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Smith (WA) amendment (A001) Agreed to by recorded vote: 236 - 193 (Roll no. 438).
House amendment offered/reported by: Amendment (A001) offered by Mr. Smith (WA).
